function NPC_610201:OnSpawn( Info )
end
function NPC_610201:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : 머리 파츠 데미지 누적 2 : 포자(가슴) 파츠 데미지 누적 3 : 뿌리 파츠 데미지 누적 4 : Pain패턴을 보이기 위한 데미지 누적 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 5 )
local MaxHP = NPC_610201.MaxHP
NPC_610201.LimitForBreakHead = MaxHP/10 -- 머리파츠 NPC_610201.LimitForBreakRoot = MaxHP*1/4 -- 꼬리파츠
NPC_610201.LimitForModeChangeRoot = MaxHP/10 -- 모드1 체인지 NPC_610201.LimitForModeChangeUnroot = MaxHP/10 -- 모드0 체인지 NPC_610201.LimitForPainReaction = MaxHP/5 -- 글로벌 페인 NPC_610201.LimitForStopVitalize = 10 -- 활력취소 NPC_610201.RootRegenTick = MaxHP/500 -- 꼬리 파괴 누적 데미지 복구 수치
NPC_610201.TalIdRoot = 261020103 NPC_610201.TalIdUnroot = 261020123 NPC_610201.TalIdCutRoot = 261020140 NPC_610201.TalIdPainShort = 261020112 NPC_610201.TalIdPainLong = 261020113 NPC_610201.TalIdPainHead = 261020114 NPC_610201.TalIdPainChest = 261020131 NPC_610201.TalIdVitalize = 261020129
NPC_610201.TalIdSunken1 = 261020109 NPC_610201.TalIdSunken2 = 261020110 NPC_610201.TalIdSunken3 = 261020111 NPC_610201.TalIdSunken4 = 261020149 NPC_610201.TalIdSunken5 = 261020150 NPC_610201.TalIdSunken6 = 261020151
NPC_610201.BufIdRegen = 40121 NPC_610201.BufIdSporeField = 40122 end
function NPC_610201:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 5 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
function NPC_610201:BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( 261020106 ) or ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) then return end
local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if Dist > 150 and Dist < 600 and IsRear then -- 뒤에 있을 경우 뿌리공격 if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 261020106 ) end end end
function NPC_610201:AccDamageUnroot( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) -- Acc damage local DmgAcc = 0 if PartsIdx > 0 and PartsIdx <= 3 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( PartsIdx ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( PartsIdx, DmgAcc ) end
local Mode = ThisNPC:GetMode() if Mode == 0 or Mode == 2 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, DmgAcc ) end
-- _LogHitInfo( HitInfo )
--[[ GLog( "-- Process Acc Damage Root ( P:" .. PartsIdx .. ", D:" .. HitInfo.Damage .. ", 1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ", 2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ", 3:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. ", 4:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) .. ", 5:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 5 ) .. " ) --\n" ) --]]
-- Process reaction
-- 2.2 Break root if PartsIdx == 3 and ( not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) ) and ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) > NPC_610201.LimitForBreakRoot then --GLog( "Break Part(3) \n" )
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 3, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdCutRoot ) -- 꼬리잘림 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) return end
if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_610201.TalIdPainShort ) or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent( ) == NPC_610201.TalIdSunken1 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent( ) == NPC_610201.TalIdSunken2 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent( ) == NPC_610201.TalIdSunken3 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent( ) == NPC_610201.TalIdSunken4 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent( ) == NPC_610201.TalIdSunken5 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent( ) == NPC_610201.TalIdSunken6 then return end
-- 2. Break part -- 2.1 Break head if PartsIdx == 1 and ( not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) or not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) ) and ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) > NPC_610201.LimitForBreakHead then --GLog( "Break Part(1) \n" )
ThisNPC:ClearJob() if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) then ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) else ThisNPC:BreakPart( 2, HitInfo.Attacker ) end
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdPainHead ) -- 머리아픔 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) return end
-- 3 Pain if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) > NPC_610201.LimitForPainReaction and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() if PartsIdx == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdPainHead ) -- Pain3 else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdPainShort ) -- Pain1 end ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end end
function NPC_610201:AccDamageRoot( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) if HitInfo.TalentID == NPC_610201.TalIdVitalize then -- 활력 탤런트로 맞을 경우는 패스 return end
-- Acc damage local DmgAcc = 0 local PainPoint = 0 if PartsIdx == 2 then PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + PainPoint ) elseif PartsIdx > 0 and PartsIdx <= 3 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( PartsIdx ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( PartsIdx, DmgAcc ) end
local Mode = ThisNPC:GetMode() if Mode == 1 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, DmgAcc ) end
--[[ GLog( "-- Process Acc Damage Root ( P:" .. PartsIdx .. ", D:" .. HitInfo.Damage .. ", 1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ", 2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ", 3:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. ", 4:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) .. ", 5:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 5 ) .. " ) --\n" ) --]]
-- _LogHitInfo( HitInfo ) -- GLog( "PainPoint(" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. "," .. PainPoint .. ")\n" )
-- GLog( "Breast Hit\n") -- Chest if PartsIdx == 2 and ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) > NPC_610201.LimitForStopVitalize and PainPoint > 0 then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdPainChest ) -- Pain1
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) return end
-- 2.1 Break head if PartsIdx == 1 and ( not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) or not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) ) and ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) > NPC_610201.LimitForBreakHead then --GLog( "Break Part(1) \n" )
ThisNPC:ClearJob() if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) then ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) else ThisNPC:BreakPart( 2, HitInfo.Attacker ) end
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdPainChest ) -- 머리아픔 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) return end
-- 3 Golbal Pain if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) > NPC_610201.LimitForPainReaction and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_610201.TalIdPainChest ) -- Pain1 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end end
function NPC_610201:OnStartVitalize( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
-- 활력 취소를 위한 변수 재설정 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
function NPC_610201:OnStartRoot( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnStartRoot \n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_610201.BufIdRegen ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_610201.BufIdSporeField )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end
function NPC_610201:OnStartUnroot( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "OnStartUnRoot \n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_610201.BufIdRegen ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_610201.BufIdSporeField )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end
-- 활력 시전시 꼬리파츠 누적데미지 감소 function NPC_610201:OnTryHit( Actor, TalentID ) if TalentID ~= NPC_610201.TalIdVitalize then return end
local Damage = this:GetUserData( 3 ) - NPC_610201.RootRegenTick if Damage < 0 then Damage = 0 end
this:SetUserData( 3, Damage ) end
